x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/login"

post.operationId: Handle a login request to the application.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/login"

post.operationId: Log the user out of the application.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/logout"
curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/register"

post.operationId: Handle a registration request for the application.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/register"

get.operationId: Display the form to request a password reset link.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/password/reset"
curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/password/reset"

post.operationId: Send a reset link to the given user.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/password/email"

get.operationId: Display the password reset view for the given token.
get.description: If no token is present, display the link request form.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/password/reset/{token}"
curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/email/verify"

get.operationId: Mark the authenticated user's email address as verified.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/email/verify/{id}"
curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/email/resend"
curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/home"

get.operationId: Redirect the user to the GitHub authentication page.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/login-with/{provider}"
curl -X GET -G "https://navigateme.ngrok.io/login-with/{provider}/callback"
